header_text: Your child wants to go trick-or-treating, and they begged you to dress up with them. You wear a costume and run into some people from work who aren't dressed up. They think your costume is awesome.

elements.text: Your child wants to go trick-or-treating, and they begged you to dress up with them. You wear a costume and run into some people from work who aren't dressed up. They think your costume is awesome.
